mapper.select: select inn.id,orderId,product.name as productName,supplier.name as supplierName,productNum,createdDate,lastModifyDate,inn.info from inn,product,supplier where orderId like "%"#{key}"%" and product.Id = inn.productId and inn.supplierId=supplier.id order by inn.id limit #{start},#{num}
select count(id) from inn where orderId like "%"#{key}"%"
